name: Fall Ball (Andypoo)
description:
This is a small game with 8 levels that gets harder each time. I am planning on making an expansion for it with harder levels. Fall Ball is the first game developed by Andypoo Games, there will be more titles in the future.

-MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS-

OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 64-bit
Processor: Intel Pentium CPU B980 @ 2.40GHz
Installed Memory (RAM): 4 GB
Video: OpenGL 3.2 Support with 512 MB Memory 
Screen Resolution: 1280x720
Storage: 5 MB of Free Space
Mouse: 3-Button Microsoft-Compatible Mouse
